title: Gravity eSports LF Jg
body:
Hey lads Gravity eSports are looking for a dedicated jungler dat keen to join us ..
We need a jg dat can play in OOL tomorrow 

    Playing the main top lane role for Gravity eSports.
    Be of a Diamond 3+ Rank.
    Attend all scrimmages and training sessions, and have an open schedule to facilitate such responsibilities.
    Compete in the OOL taking place every Saturday.
    Keeping a calm and collected mind under the heat of battle and be highly vocal in communication yet mature.
    
If u are keen u can add me in game or comment down below
